quote: True spirituality is not about escaping from the world, but diving deeper into it, understanding its essence, and realizing the interconnectedness of all beings.
author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quote: Sadness is not a sign of weakness but a call to explore the depths of your being, to discover your inner strength, and to emerge with a newfound understanding of life's complexities.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Insecurity arises from our attachment to external outcomes and the illusion of control. True security lies in accepting the impermanence of life and finding inner stability through self-realization.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Spirituality is the art of nurturing your soul, expanding your consciousness, and finding unity with the divine. It is a path of self-discovery and inner transformation.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Sadness is a temporary state of being. Embrace it, explore its depths, and allow it to transform you. In the process, you will uncover the wisdom and strength that lie within.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Insecurity stems from our identification with the ever-changing body, mind, and circumstances. Realize your true nature as the eternal soul, beyond all limitations, and experience inner freedom.
author: Sri Ramana Maharshi

quote: Spirituality is not about religious rituals or beliefs but about realizing the divinity within you. It is a journey of self-discovery and self-transcendence, leading to inner peace and fulfillment.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Sadness can be a catalyst for spiritual growth. It compels us to seek deeper meaning, question our attachments, and cultivate compassion and empathy towards ourselves and others.
author: Sri Chinmoy

quote: Insecurity arises when we identify ourselves with temporary roles and external circumstances. Realize your eternal nature, embrace your uniqueness, and radiate confidence from within.
author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quote: Spirituality is the realization that we are all interconnected and part of a larger cosmic tapestry. It is the recognition of the divinity within ourselves and all of creation.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Love is the bridge that connects hearts, transcends differences, and unites humanity in a shared journey of compassion and understanding.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Forgiveness is not about condoning actions but about liberating yourself from the burden of resentment, allowing healing and growth to take place.
author: Sri Ramana Maharshi

quote: Do not be sad; for the joy of the Lord is your strength.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Insecurity is often the culprit behind arrogance.
author: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose

quote: Spirituality is the basis of all my political ideas.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I do not want to foresee the future. I am concerned with taking care of the present. God has given me no control over the moment following.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Spirituality is indeed the master key of the Indian mind; the sense of the infinitive is native to it.
author: Sri Aurobindo

quote: Sadness is a wall between two gardens.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Fear of death makes us devoid both of valour and religion. For want of valour is want of religious faith.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: In spirituality, seeking has to become a conscious process.
author: Sadhguru

quote: Sadness is an ocean; it is vast, deep, and endless.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I'm not perfect; I will fall sick, I will break a leg, but nothing will stop my mind from working.
author: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose

quote: Spirituality is the science of the soul.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: The true source of our suffering has been our timidity.
author: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose

quote: The only thing that separates women of color from anyone else is opportunity.
author: Viola Davis

quote: My greatest strength is common sense. I'm really a standard brand - like Campbell's tomato soup or Baker's chocolate.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Religion is the manifestation of the divinity already in man.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.
author: José N. Harris

quote: He who is overly attached to his family members experiences fear and sorrow, for the root of all grief is attachment. Thus one should discard attachment to be happy.
author: Chanakya

quote: True spirituality is a mental attitude you can practice at any time.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Sadness is silent, it is yours. It is coming because you are alone. It is giving you a chance to go deeper into your aloneness.
author: Osho

quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The only medicine for suffering, crime, and all other woes of mankind is wisdom.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Insecurity, always remember, is a kind of death to the soul.
author: Sadhguru

quote: Spirituality is not about looking for God; it's about peeling away the veils until you realize that God is all that there is in the universe.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
author: Buddha

quote: Don't be sad because it's over. Smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The greatest religion is to be true to your own nature. Have faith in yourselves.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Insecurity is the worst sense that lovers feel: sometimes the most humdrum desireless marriage seems better. Insecurity twists meanings and poisons trust.
author: Graham Greene

quote: Spirituality does not lie in sign of the cross or putting marks on the forehead or dressing in a particular fashion. All that is external.
author: Swami Satchidananda

quote: The reason why the world lacks unity, and lies broken and in heaps, is because man is disunited with himself.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Sadness is an opportunity to be compassionate.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
author: Rumi

quote: Fearlessness is the first requisite of spirituality.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: To be free from all authority, of your own and that of another, is to die to everything of yesterday, so that your mind is always fresh, always young, innocent, full of vigour and passion.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Don't think there are no second chances. Life always offers you a second chance. It's called tomorrow.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Fear is the cheapest room in the house. I would like to see you living in better conditions.
author: Hafiz

quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Spirituality is the basis of all my political ideas.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I had learned that fighting on the side of righteousness was more important than seeking personal happiness.
author: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose

quote: Sadness is a gift. Embrace it.
author: Sadhguru

quote: Fearlessness is not the absence of fear. It's the mastery of fear.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Spirituality is not a belief, it's a way of life.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Insecurity stems from a lack of self-awareness.
author: Deepika Padukone

quote: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to yourself and others.
author: Buddha

quote: Sadness is the result of unhappy thoughts.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: You have to grow from the inside out. None can teach you, none can make you spiritual. There is no other teacher but your own soul.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Insecurity is an ugly thing, it makes you hate people you don't even know.
author: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose

quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Spirituality does not consist in meditating only while you are walking, working or doing other activities; rather, spirituality consists in doing all your activities, in living your life in such a way that there is a little meditation happening in all that you do.
author: Swami Satchidananda

quote: Sadness gives depth. Happiness gives height. Sadness gives roots. Happiness gives branches. Happiness is like a tree going into the sky, and sadness is like the roots going down into the womb of the earth. Both are needed, and the higher a tree goes, the deeper it goes, simultaneously. The bigger the tree, the bigger will be its roots. In fact, it is always in proportion. That's its balance.
author: Osho

quote: Insecurity is a waste of time.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: The spiritual journey is the unlearning of fear and the acceptance of love.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Spirituality is a science that teaches us how to live happily in any situation.
author: Pandurang Shastri Athavale

quote: The only antidote to insecurity is courage.
author: Ratan Tata

quote: If you look to others for fulfillment, you will never be fulfilled.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Spirituality is not just meditation; it's your whole life.
author: Sadhguru

quote: The sadness will last forever.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Insecurity is the lack of trust in your abilities.
author: Ravish Kumar
